name: gremlin.exedotexe
description:
Made in ~a week (minus one day at a convention and another playing Minecraft) for the first annual RevJam!

CONTROLS:

MOVE:   wasd / arrow keys / left stick

SPRINT:  left shift / left trigger

INTERACT:  f / b

CHANGE ITEM:  q / e / mousewheel / bumpers

USE ITEM:  left click / right trigger

LOCK/UNLOCK MOUSE CURSOR:  escape / start

Place bait bags on the floor to keep the Gremlin satisfied, at least for a short while...

MISSING FEATURES: (because time)

-Gremlin can crawl on the ceiling

-Gremlin runs across view with spooky timing

 -Main Menu & Pause Menu

-Fancy props to make the level actually not bland

-A meme-y Stardew Valley & MSC themed jape ending
